summary: Adds a glow to filled soul gems, as well as a few other improvements.
descriptionHtml:
[b]By: Ayhay123

Adds a glow to filled soul gems, as well as a few other improvements.


====Features====

- New Textures for soul gems

- Slightly transparent soul gems (Both filled and not filled)

- Filled soul gems have a glow


====Bugs====

- At certain angles, the glow may not show

- The inventory models of the filled soul gems are slightly off centre (Once I learn how to fix it, I will. If anyone knows how to please let me know.)

- Conflicts with mods that change filled soul gems in any way (even if it changes its name, such as Headbombs Better Sorting. To fix this, just go into CK and change name and weight in Glowing Soul Gems.esp to match that of Headbomb\'s, or any other mod.)[/b]
author: Ayhay123
